Desc.eng: You are the one who is always complaining that no one takes you seriously without a diploma, right?
Well, how about a nice certificate that would qualify you as a mushroom expert?
Really? A certificate? I always wanted to be a mushroom expert, but I wasnâ€™t clever enough to pass the exams. I'm willing to pay a hefty sum for this.
The Resistance health care is in good hands, I see.
